title: The Forever Walk: China
overview: The Forever Walk: China presents the China segment of "The Out of Eden Walk," one of the most innovative global storytelling projects of our era, an epic multiyear foot journey by National Geographic explorer and writer Paul Salopek. This documentary series follows Paul's epic journey on foot across China, showcasing the rich tapestry of the country's cultural, natural, and historical landscapes through his unique perspective. As Paul traverses the ecologically and culturally diverse regions of China, he forms deep connections with his Chinese walking partners, offering viewers an intimate and insightful exploration of this vast and ancient land.Â
